```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(widyr)

library(courseraswiftkey)
```

```{r}
data(en_us_news)
```

```{r}
text <- en_us_news %>%
  sample_n(1000)
```

```{r}
word_cors <- text %>%
  unnest_tokens(word, text) %>%
  group_by(word) %>%
  filter(n() >= 20) %>%
  pairwise_cor(word, line, sort = TRUE)

word_cors
```

```{r}
word_cors %>%
  filter(item1 == "than")
```

```{r}
ym_1b <- word_cors %>%
  group_by(item1) %>%
  top_n(3, correlation)

ym_1b %>%
  filter(item1 == "than")
```

```{r}
write_rds(ym_1b, path = "ym_1b.rds")
```
